name: 10k Tactics Prototype
description:
Early unfinished prototype!

Controls:

  • Left click to perform an action.
  • Right click to select things.
  • 1, 2, 3, 4 to activate an ability.
  • Middle mouse button rotates the camera.
  • Q, W, E, A, S, D also control the camera.
  • C to center the camera.
  • Enter ends player turn.
  • Space ends units turn.
  • Alt-Enter to switch between full screen and windowed mode.
  • Alt-F4 to quit.
  • You can equip abilities in the Heroes Menu.
